text: Nikolai Andreyevich Tsymbal (; 20 January 1925 - 15 January 2020) was an officer of the Soviet Armed Forces. He worked in the force's political branch and reached the rank of . He was deputy head of the Gagarin Air Force Academy. He was awarded the Order of the Red Banner, the Order of the Red Banner of Labour, and the Order of Friendship. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Soviet military personnel of World War II Category:Soviet generals Category:Russian generals
title: Nikolai Tsymbal
